items.product_description:
Carbon Frame/Fork
Shimano 105 2 x 11 Speed Shifting
Shimano Rim Brake Calipers
Comfortable endurance frame geometry

Versatile, comfortable, and durable, YNOT Pedal Straps are adjustable to fit nearly any footwear. Great for anybody that rides hard and needs the ultimate foot retention system. SOLD IN PAIRS.


FEATURES:

Triple layer reinforcement for added strength
Keep their desired shape, allowing you to easily get your footing every time.
Ideal for commuting, cross, FGFS, mountain biking, hardworking messengers & everyday riding.
Availablity in a variety of colours and designs so you can customize your ride.
Every set of straps comes with a vinyl YNOT decal.

FIT:
Adjustable to accommodate nearly any footwear, from slip-ons to winter boots
Bottom strap fit any standard platform pedal with 3/4" x 5/16" slotted openings

CONSTRUCTION:
Available in: 1000D CORDURA® exterior (North American Milled), Heavy-duty Reinforced Vinyl, Reclaimed Leather, Repurposed Denim*
Constructed with heavy duty nylon, industrial-strength hook & loop and durable nickel-plated hardware
Made in Toronto, Canada
Weight: g / 0.35 lb
*Cut Off straps are made from repurposed denim. Because of this, the colour / wash of the denim on each set may vary.
*Pedals not included.
*Warning: The use of any foot retention system on a bicycle entails a degree of risk. YNOT Cycle and Tantra Bicycle Co. does not assume any responsibility for any damage or injury that occurs while using these Pedal Straps.

This belt compatible key holder has a quick release magnetic clip that allows you to take your keys on and off with one hand. The KEYClip has a 2" loop that allows for all sized belts to be passed through it and the military style snap hook would then hold your keys. You can also wear it the other way, where you use the 2" loop to hold your keys and the military hook to snap onto belt loops or bags.

FEATURES:

Can be passed through your belt
Military style metal snap hook
Auto-locating magnetic hardware to take your keys quickly and easily on and off
CONSTRUCTION:

Auto-locating magnetic hardware
Metal snap hook
1" nylon webbing
Sewn with no. 69 nylon thread
Bartacked for reinforcement
Made in Toronto, Canada. Lifetime warranty.
SPECS

Dimensions: Height: 7", Width: 1"

A Fixed Gear / Single Speed Bike that'll fly through traffic jams and will beat down the grind of your daily commute. This is your bicycle for urban riding. 

Frame: Tantra Aircraft Grade 6061 Aluminum Alloy
Fork: Tantra Aircraft Grade 6061 Aluminum Alloy
Front Hub: High Flange, Sealed Cartridge Bearings, Bolt-on
Rear Hub: High Flange, Sealed Cartridge Bearings, Bolt-on
Headset: 1 1/8" Threadless Integrated
Crankset: 46T Chainring, 170mm Crank
Bottom Bracket: O’ring Sealed Cartridge, 103mm, BSA
Pedals: BMX Flat Pedals Alloy
Cog: 16T Fixed Cog / 16T Freewheel 
Chain: KMC Z-410 
Handlebar: Bullhorns Alloy 
Stem: 70mm Alloy
Grips: Velo Track 1800mm PVC
Saddle: PX2
Seat Post: Tantra Alloy
Seat Clamp: Alloy 28.6mm
Wheelset: Tantra 30mm Deep Dish 32 hole Rims, Flip-Flop Hub Alloy
Tires: 700 x 23c
Front Brake: 55mm Alloy Brake Lever Hinged Alloy Lever
Weight: 20.7 lbs or 9.4 kg

The ideal companion on all-mountain and trail tours. The TrailRS provides all round protection with Inmould technology in which the helmet is directly connected with the absorbing EPS material. The high number of ventilation openings, as well as the placement angles and integrated channels provide lots of air circulation and the best cooling. The two-components adjustment unit with precision interlocking, "ErgoFit UltraTM" creates a comfortable and extremely exact fit vertically and horizontally, guaranteeing a good fit and a high degree of wearing comfort. The visor is fully adjustable and has a quick release system, "QuickRelease" that allows the visor to fold out of the way in the case of a fall. This means that we can minimize the danger of injuries and the risk of damage. The TrailRS helmet series fulfils the European safety standard, EN1078 as well as the American CPSC. full inmould coverage for optimized absorbtion and weight aeration system with 22 large vents and internal air channels adjustable bolt system MX style visor, optimized felxibility and full visual field crash release visor Dual-Compound dial adjuster Ergo-Fit Ultra, fully flexible and adjustable retention system Dual-Compound head ring for highest comfort and optimized fit Dual-Inmould, lower 360 degree inmould shell to prevent from damage Y-Clip adjustable strap system ratchet safety closure SM (54-58cm), ML (58-62cm) EN1078 & CPSC certified +\/- 320g

Shimano 105 2 x 11 Speed Shifting
Shimano Rim Brake Calipers
Comfortable endurance frame geometry
